about_the_game:
In the epic journey of "Lutarus," you'll immerse yourself in the role of Luxtar, a young hero accompanied by his faithful lutaru, Chinchulin, on a quest to save your community. Along this path, you'll face indescribable dangers, testing the limits of your courage and skill. Yet, beware, for not only must you battle deadly foes, but also safeguard your mental well-being, as the encroaching darkness threatens to corrupt even the bravest of hearts.

As you progress through this thrilling odyssey, you'll uncover ancient secrets, long-forgotten mysteries that could alter the course of humanity forever. Each step you take brings you closer to the abyss of truth, where the weight of your choices will shape the unfolding saga.

Prepare yourself for a legendary experience where the fate of your people and the future of the world rest in your hands!

content_descriptors.notes:
Alcohol and Substance Abuse, Mental Health Conditions:
This game may contain references to substances abuse, as well as themes related to mental health conditions.

Violence Among Creatures and Individuals:
Players should be aware that this game may depict scenes of violence, both among creatures and individuals.

Discrimination:
This game may address themes of discrimination based on factors as wealth abd happiness.

Cadavers and Murder:
Please note that this game may include depictions of cadavers, murder, and related themes.

detailed_description:
In the epic journey of "Lutarus," you'll immerse yourself in the role of Luxtar, a young hero accompanied by his faithful lutaru, Chinchulin, on a quest to save your community. Along this path, you'll face indescribable dangers, testing the limits of your courage and skill. Yet, beware, for not only must you battle deadly foes, but also safeguard your mental well-being, as the encroaching darkness threatens to corrupt even the bravest of hearts.

As you progress through this thrilling odyssey, you'll uncover ancient secrets, long-forgotten mysteries that could alter the course of humanity forever. Each step you take brings you closer to the abyss of truth, where the weight of your choices will shape the unfolding saga.

Prepare yourself for a legendary experience where the fate of your people and the future of the world rest in your hands!
legal_notice: "Lutarus" is under the intellectual property ownership of El Wen Chalax, Gonzalo Hernan Herrera Medina, including the game's art, storyline, dialogues, characters, mechanics, and creatures.
name: Lutarus

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8600 or AMD Phenom II X4 945
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R5 230 or Nvidia GeForce GT 520
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: An epic RPG adventure. Follow Luxtar and his loyal lutaru on a quest to save their community. Navigate dangers, safeguard his mental well-being, and uncover ancient secrets to shape the fate of humanity.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil
